articles.content: As I noted in my initial hands-on impressions with the $999 MacBook Air, this base model MacBook Air is a good option for Mac users in search of a no-frills laptop experience. If youre the type who primarily uses a laptop for everyday tasks like web browsing,… [+9177 chars]

articles.author: Scott Stein
articles.title: With real theaters closed, actors are turning to virtual reality - CNET
articles.description: The Under Presents is part game, part immersive theater. Its performers have been living virtually for months, paving a way for where all of us may be heading.
articles.content:
The Under Presents has been running for months. It's a model for where virtual theater could evolve.
Tender Claws
I used to love spending time in immersive theater, in the real world. Site-specific spaces like Then She Fell and Sleep No More, where actors a… [+8393 chars]
